summary.span: 指定应用程序设置属性具有适用于应用程序所有用户的公共值。

span.span: Specifies that an application settings property has a common value for all users of an application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 应用程序设置属性具有在应用程序或用户级别所基于的作用域。Application settings properties have a scope that is based either at the application or the user level. 顾名思义，应用程序范围的设置的属性提供的应用程序中，所有用户统一的值，而用户范围的属性具有专用的每个用户的应用程序的值。As the categories imply, application-scoped settings properties present uniform values to all users of the application, whereas user-scoped properties have dedicated values for each user of the application. 指示属性应被视为一个应用程序级设置，并且应相应地做出相应的存储的决策通过设置提供程序。The indicates that a property should be considered an application-level setting, and that appropriate storage decisions should be made accordingly by the settings provider. 需要为每个设置属性的作用域属性。A scope attribute is required for each settings property. 如果未对属性应用或，设置提供程序无法识别的属性，则不会序列化。If a property is not applied with either a or , the property is not recognized by the settings provider—it is not serialized. 它是无效的但是，将这两个属性应用于相同的属性。It is invalid, however, to apply both attributes to the same property. 这类尝试将导致引发。Such an attempt will cause a to be thrown.
